about.title: About
about.msg_1: I am passionate about software development, constantly seeking ways to combine technological innovation with organizational efficiency. Organized and methodical, I approach every challenge with a problem-solving mindset. My approach involves consistently elevating my skills to deliver innovative solutions. Outside of work, I invest my time in continuous learning of emerging IT trends.

school.name: CESI
skill: Cloud Solutions Integration and Service Management: Successfully implemented an active sales system on the Breizhsport e-commerce site using AWS cloud services.
Docker Usage and Containerization: Successfully implemented Docker containers for creating and deploying microservices.

Containerization Tools Deployment and Cluster Management: Configured and implemented a Kubernetes cluster for the Breizhsport project, demonstrating initiation and familiarity with containerization and orchestration concepts.
Microservices Design and Development: Successfully created microservices for the Breizhsport project, implementing a modular and scalable architecture.
PHPUnit Unit Testing Implementation: Successfully integrated unit tests with PHPUnit in the development of Breizhsport project components, ensuring code robustness and reliability.
school.subject: Program:
school.tools: MAALSI (Manager in Architecture and Software Applications of Information Systems).

school.name: CESI
skill: Complete Project Management in Full-Stack Environment: Successfully implemented the GoodFood project, overseeing the development of a mobile/web application.

Roadmap Strategy and Task Prioritization: Designed and implemented a roadmap for the Project Manager Officer Time'Eats project. Effective use of KPIs to guide decisions, ensuring alignment of activities with strategic business objectives.
Communication and Presentation Skills: Presentation experience in front of a board of directors, highlighting advanced communication and soft skills.
school.subject: Program:
school.tools: MAALSI (Manager in Architecture and Software Applications of Information Systems).

school.name: CESI
skill: Development of a Social Network Application: Used JavaSpring and NextJS technologies to create an interactive platform, demonstrating versatility in choosing and mastering multiple frameworks.

Learning and Mastery of Git: Acquired essential version control skills with Git during the ProjeRE project, marking the beginning of regular use of this technology for tracking changes in source code.
Incomplete Project Management: Participated in the design and implementation of the ProjeRE social network, although the project was not fully completed.
Participation in an Ambitious Project: Actively learned software development best practices as the ProjeRE project progressed despite encountered difficulties.

school.name: Lyc√©e Jules Ferry
skill: IHM Development: Successfully designed and developed the user interface (IHM) of the syringe pump application using C#.
Database Design: Responsible for designing the underlying database, demonstrating an in-depth understanding of data management principles.
Mail Alert Management: Successfully implemented an email alert system in the syringe pump application.
Teamwork on a Technical Project: Actively participated in a concrete technical project for the development of medical equipment.
school.subject: Program:
school.tools: BTS SNIR (Digital Systems with Computer and Networks option).

company.name: Bigben-connected
skill: Successful Migration: Successfully migrated a native PHP application to Laravel.
PHP Intranet Development: Developed a PHP5.6 intranet application, showcasing extensive full-stack skills and an ability to create solutions tailored to the company's specific needs.

Project Manager VMI ZOE: Successfully executed the VMI project (focused on replenishment management and stock control) as the project manager for the ZOE application. Gained expertise in project management, development, and acquired in-depth knowledge of VMI business logic.
CI Implementation with Jenkins: Successfully implemented continuous integration (CI) with Jenkins, demonstrating expertise in creating an integration pipeline.
Stripe Payment Integration: Successfully implemented a payment solution with Stripe, utilizing webhooks.
Testing: Used PHPUnit for unit tests, ensuring software quality through automated tests.

company.name: Proxiserve
skill: Successful Mobile Development: Successfully designed and created the company's first mobile application using Android Studio in Java.
RSS Feed Integration: Successfully integrated the company's website RSS feed into the mobile application.
Autonomy and Initiative: Took personal initiative in the development of the application.
